website_summaries.verdict: This affordable, sturdy litter box delivers a great value.
pros: Non-stick surface is easy to clean
Ionpure technology combats bacteria and odor
cons: The opening is somewhat small and not ideal for larger cats

website_summaries.verdict: A high quality litter box that provides your cat with plenty of space and privacy.
pros: Triangular base fits snugly into the corner of any room
Front opening is large enough to do daily scooping without detaching the lid
Nonstick interior is easy to clean
Included charcoal filter actively combats strong litter box odors
The lid locks securely in place to avoid messes
cons: Box is large and may be too bulky for smaller homes

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large Maine coon who has become accustomed to pooping directly outside of every litter box I buy. I'm rating this litter box 4 stars because he still poops outside of it, but he fits in there, so now I know it has nothing to do with the size of the box. He's just a jerk.
customer_reviews.author: K...

customer_reviews.title: This box is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I did not read the reviews first. I thought this box would be a great space saver, as my other litter box was a bit awkward for my space. Well, this thing came today and it is HUGE. Don't get me wrong, I like it, as do my cats, but this thing takes a lot of litter and is even more awkward in the corner. So make sure you have a BIG corner! It is definitely a nice box for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Kit the cat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome litter box for big cat!
customer_reviews.text: Great litter box for my 18 lb. cat. She has plenty of room to move around and I like the wide opening. The depth of the litter box keeps her from getting the litter everywhere. Very durable and fits perfectly in a corner. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: luckykit69

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats really like this catbox, and it conveniently fits in the corner entrance to our apartment--out of the way but easy to get to. Incidentally, the smell-reducing filter really works. It's the best cat box I've ever had and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not prevent cat pee from getting through the sides
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this covered cat box to prevent my cats from peeing over the edge of the box. They did this a lot with the previous box. I had such high hopes. Unfortunately this box does not have a proper lip to prevent cat pee from getting in-between the lid and the bottom plastic pieces. So, the cats are able to pee through the sides of this “covered” cat box. I am very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Buhler

customer_reviews.title: Urine will leak if your cats are "high peeers"
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not attach well to the bottom. As both my male cats are "high peeers," a good amount of urine leaks down the outside of the bottom onto the mat and then into my hard wood floor. It is also easy for my cats to kick out a large amount of litter out the front. On the plus side, this is a very large box (both my guys are around 18-pounds) and fits into a corner very nicely. I would get an upgraded model if the lid design were fixed to prevent leakage.
customer_reviews.author: ICUAlex

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this liter box, it really is great. I have two large cats, one that would go "head first" into the previous traditional covered box resulting in pee accidents on the bathroom floor. This box is so large yet takes up so little space. Since setting this box up in the corner of the half bath, no more accidents. There's plenty of room for him to handle his business while keeping my floor pee free. Also, this box has really helped to contain the liter scatter. There is still a little that he manages to kick out because he is an aggressive digger but it is sooooo sooooo much better since buying this liter box.
customer_reviews.author: msfreda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best litter boxes I have ever used in over 35 years having cats. High sides prevent excess litter on the floor, sides are treated so they stay slick and non-porous, urine doesn't leak outside between lid and box (thanks to a clever design), plastic is sturdy, opening is large enough for a big tomcat of maybe 15-20 lbs, and it can hold a good amount of litter (great with multiple cats). Overall, cost on Amazon for this item is less than half of what the chain pet stores charge, so it makes it a super value.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Love the dimensions & height but doesn't clean easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the height, it allows my cats to void upright without hunched over. For whatever reason I have one cat who likes to pee near the front below the opening. The litter sticks so badly to the inside there versus the other sides of the box. Caused me to have broken the scooper. Had to start using liner bags which get tore up with his claws. But otherwise I do like the dimensions & height.
customer_reviews.author: Brenan Dingler

customer_reviews.title: Great Litter Box for Small Dogs Who are Litter Box Trained
customer_reviews.text: Awesome litter box! Have a few. (I am the one who posted the video Alaskan Klee Kais Who Use Litter Boxes; somehow my original review I wrote with the video disappeared but the video is still there.) Would only recommend for Toy and Miniature sized Klee Kais dogs if you use the lid but if you decide not to use the lid then no worries. My two are 9 lbs and 14 lbs. Easy to clean and pop the top off to change the filter and clean out the litter box. Would definitely recommend for small dogs who are litter box trained.
customer_reviews.author: skyylab

customer_reviews.title: Good box!
customer_reviews.text: Received this box on Monday and am overall pretty pleased. It's much larger, taller I should say, than I had expected, granted I only have 1 cat and he's average size - this would be ideal for the "more to love" cats as the opening is very generous. Unfortunately, I'll have to monitor it as our dogs will likely be able to get into it with ease. I was hoping to sneak this into a corner in our 1/2 bathroom but it is far too large. Functionally, it's great and does just the job. The top lid clips onto the bottom, and the tray has tall sides to prevent leaks in between for those kitties that spray/miss.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size for my 12 pound cat and easy for me to clean. Looks better in the corner of room than a traditional box.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Tall but good for large cats
customer_reviews.text: My large guy (Maine coon) is much happier with the big box. I find that it's really the height that's big; the box isn't super wide or anything. He seems to like the extra space, though, and has had a significantly cleaner butt ever since switching to this. It took him 3-4 days to decide it wasn't actually a kitty carrier that was going to take him to the vet, so give your cat some time to adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very large! Perfect for multiple cats
customer_reviews.text: This box is great and very large for people with multiple cats. It has a high lip on the entrance which keeps litter tracking and spillage to a minimum. The corner design is unique and fits well in our hallway but still allows a lot of room for cats to move about while using the box. This is definitely a very high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Erin Maclean

customer_reviews.title: HUGE litter box
customer_reviews.text: We specifically picked this litter box because of its size. We wanted a covered litter box, but not one with a swinging door. We have a two year old and a three month old. The three month old "thinks" she's covering her poo, but she just scratches to death the plastic. She can also fling her doo doo like nobody's business...hence the giant litter box with a cover. We love this thing. It's enormous, but fits well in the corner of our spare room on an area rug we purchased to catch any tracking litter. We love it and the girls seem quite happy as well.
customer_reviews.author: LidoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well in Corner, Prevents Litter From Being Kicked Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that kick litter EVERYWHERE, so this thing is a miracle. I've gone through like 5 different litterbox setup, and this is the best so far. Fits well into the corner and holds a lot of litter, but it prevents them from making too much of a mess between the top lid and the front lip. I don't think the top filter does much for smell, I think it depends more on the type of litter you buy and how often you scoop it. But I just have this one litter box for two cats, and I scoop it once a day, and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not fit tight and bottom is not strong
customer_reviews.text: The top does not fit tight and pee WILL leak if you have a high pee'r. The bottom part is not sturdy either. why can't they make a box with an actual seal all around, like weatherstripping or something, so they will not leak?
customer_reviews.author: SheriD43

customer_reviews.title: Love the design, fits vll
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with a litter mat and genie to try and keeps up with the mess. This is the best size for my big boy. He is really annoying about peeing in the same spot and the bota box I had before was tough to clean. This I can peer inside of to scoop and the side walls are so high he can't see on the lid seam anymore. He still jumps out and kicks litter everywhere but I think that's cause he's not real bright.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats with bad aim
customer_reviews.text: My cats have a case of “elevator butt” where they don’t always squat to pee. That being said, this is a good litter box to account for that. Sometimes they are facing out the opening and I still get pee where it shouldn’t be, but at least it’s more controlled. It’s not hard to clean, but it’s definitely larger than I thought it would be. That’s okay though since I think my cats enjoy all the space they have. I have some other litter box options and they don’t seem to have a preference from what I can tell. I really enjoy the corner design.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Is a good litter box
customer_reviews.text: Did is my second box, my cat's love it but mine came with a clip side that doesn't clip and annoying because my biggest cat is always scratching that side my other cat just goes and comes out. Now the litter does stick to the bottom and sides but that could be the kind of litter I use, I guess I'll keep looking for one that won't have any problems with clippers. But otherwise is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No smell litter box
customer_reviews.text: Hate the mess of cat litter, even worse the smell! OMG, it makes me sick and can't breathe. We have two visiting cats, they immediately went to the litter box without any problems. The mess is not bad when they get out, I have a towel on the floor. Our guest cleans the poop every day, but we don't notice it so much, probably because of the filter. We are using the clear pellet litter that prevents clumping, this requires two bags which are supposed to last 6 weeks. It is larger than I imagined, but it fits behind the laundry room door quite well.
customer_reviews.author: NormaJeanH

customer_reviews.title: Big, but not for sprayers!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for getting a large box out of the way. But, unfortunately, one of my cats likes to spray the walls when she pees and this box doesn't guard against urine getting through where the base and hood connect, or into the latches. It also doesn't have handles so it can be moved easily, meaning to carry it I have to touch where her urine went through the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Siliofor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My cat love this box, he uses it the most. It's very big inside, along with a very large entrance. It took care of the privacy issues he was having. I would find poop occasionally in an out of the way corner of the house. Once I replaced one of his boxes with this one, the problem stopped. I highly recommend this one, even if you have a small cat. The more room and privacy they have, the better!
customer_reviews.author: Kap1247

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best litter box I have ever owned!! My 5 large cats have plenty of room inside. The 'leavings' seem to not stick to the pan. Isn't that awesome?! The triangle shape allows me to hide it in a corner and keep the mess to a minimum. I don't really have anything bad to say about this box. If you have large cats, this box will work for you. I purchased a large metal scooper (iPrimio; from Amazon), and a litter catching mat (litter is trapped in mat, then able to be poured back in box), to use with this box. I have since had no issues with litter messes or cats 'missing' the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Huge litter box !
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is HUGE. The previous one I was using was a large, high wall litter box and it even looks so small compared to the new one. It does fit nicely in the corner. I used 35lb of litter to fill it. Probably didn't need that much though. I personally think the design could be better if the top part were shorter but the bottom taller. The box would fit in a corner even better if the sides weren't as rounded. And the lip/opening is too low. Still a great box though!
customer_reviews.author: April C.

customer_reviews.title: HUGE STICKY LABELS all over the box
customer_reviews.text: Two problems with these boxes: the first, if your cat pees where the box latches, the pee will leak out onto your floor. Big problem. Secondly, have fun removing the labels, which are huge and stuck to the front and the center of the bottom of the inside of the pan. They take forever to remove if you do not have some kind of adhesive remover. It is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry designer, artist and gardener

customer_reviews.title: It is big, and yes, cats use it.
customer_reviews.text: Welll, surprised, even our big 25lb cat goes into this box. We just had it a short time, we put it into the corner first without the lid. So they would get used to the big box, then I propped the lid in the corner behind it, that as a precaution, because our Benjamin is extremely nervous about everything. So now all go in and use it. Have had no chance to change the litter, so that may be a bigger job with more pellets....but hope it will turn out ok.....
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid kl

customer_reviews.title: Its good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a couple of years now and its still in good shape I like the style of it and how it doesn't take up much room you can easily fit it in a corner . I also love the color black and white it matches my cat lol.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a big litter box.
customer_reviews.text: Our old cat Suki had recently been missing the litter in her old box and urinating out the door onto the mat. This large box lets her get inside more and has stopped the problem. It is also easy to clean if you use clumping litter because you don't have to keep taking the top off. Just reach in and scoop.
customer_reviews.author: John Colarusso

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this litter box. My cats like it too. We needed something larger than our extra large litter boxes. This gives them room to turn around and cover their creations better. I don't have the litter spilling issues that others shared about in their feedback. Maybe because I used less litter ~ about 3-4 inches. I think maybe they were accidentally filling the litter up to the first line. Whatever the case I'm super happy and will be ordering another one as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Henry

customer_reviews.title: The search is over
customer_reviews.text: My senior male cat has had no accidents since I got this box! Low easy entry with a huge opening that makes it easy to clean without having to remove the lid. I also love that it fits in the corner. I do recommend pellet litter as standard litter does scatter more with a lower entry like this.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Only covered litterbox I could fit under the sink
customer_reviews.text: I got this because our little cat used to get litter all over the wall where it would stick. Ugh. I couldn't find a covered litterbox that would fit because of the plumbing. This box fits fine when I turn it so one side faces front. No more litter on the walls and no one has to see the litterbox. Cleaning it is pretty easy, especially when I snap the top off. This has been a win-win for us and our fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Debby T.

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Investment So Far
customer_reviews.text: I have a big, old lady cat who is mostly outdoors; but we bring her into the garage every night or when it's cold. She really likes this thing and so do I. She has no problem turning around in it and she doesn't scoop litter everywhere since it has a lid. If I have to leave for a day or so and leave her in the garage, I don't feel so bad knowing that this litter box has plenty of room for her to "go" without it getting too dirty. I also bought the Nature's Miracle filter and have had no issues with smell. I recommend the Nature's Miracle scoop too! It hangs right on the lid snaps.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect large size for my two Maine Coons.
customer_reviews.text: If you own Maine Coons, or just have 15lb barn cats, this is perfect. It has the lid so they don't get skittish by anything moving around, prevents them from scratching up the walls and holds a LOT of litter. Even the opening is large enough for the tallest of cats, and no flap to make them claustrophobic or feel trapped in there. If you are looking for a LARGE sized litter box with a lid this is the one to try.
customer_reviews.author: Skullie

customer_reviews.title: I'd still recommend a little cat mat right outside the entrance to ...
customer_reviews.text: We just re-purchased this for our kitty since her first one was a bit old and had gotten smelly. This thing is HUGE, but if you have the space it's worth it. Very durable - not a flimsy cheap litter box. Keeps the litter in the box, not on the floor. I'd still recommend a little cat mat right outside the entrance to trap any litter on your kitty's paws... I got mine at Marshalls for around $8.
customer_reviews.author: Julia H

customer_reviews.title: It is okay.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Holds lots of litter and the cats like the good amount of space. Cons: Why the heck did they design the upper lid fitting OVER the bottom pan. If the lip had fit on the inside of the bottom of the pan it would be perfect. I have another litter box that does just that and I do not have leak problems. My male cat, at age 13, has not yet figured out he can squat. So, I put a piece of plastic carpet protector under the litter box to catch periodic drips. Oh, do not fill the bottom pan more than 3-4 inches. You will run into problems.
customer_reviews.author: MBMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great little poop house
customer_reviews.text: Life saver! My cat is finally not urinating on my floor and my walls out of irritation that I wasn’t finding the litter box that he had on his Christmas wish list (such a jerk my cat is!). Lots of room for him to turn around in (my cat is big and fat too), kick up litter without it jumping out of the box, and do his deed multiple times before it needs cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I've tried just about every litter pan Amazon sells. Recently I had to make the switch to a covered litter pan because one of my kitties likes to pee with her butt raised, leaving a puddle outside the box. This litter pan has a wide opening which I love and plenty of room for my cats. The only problem is that every once in a while, there is a puddle of urine behind the litter pan. I finally figured out that if she aims for either of the two hinges, the urine leaks to the outside. I solved the problem by putting a puppy training pad underneath, but that's why I can't give it a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: ms_skye

customer_reviews.title: The other one was technically fine, I just think they should be replaced every ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this litter box. The other one was technically fine, I just think they should be replaced every so often for kitty health reasons. One of my cats had a big issue with smaller boxes--she hated them and would sometimes try to stay somewhat out of it, which led to mess. This one saved me, and I like the corner design.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: so it may not be the best option for small apartments/condos
customer_reviews.text: This litterbox is extremely large, so it may not be the best option for small apartments/condos. It is large enough for 2 cats. I love the depth of the bottom because it's less litter that is tossed out over the sides. The hood is tall, so your cats shouldn't feel uncomfortable. I do believe it is overpriced. If you're looking for something that makes it harder for cats to spread litter over the sides, you may be better off purchasing a plastic storage container and making your own litter box. That would be the cheaper thing to do. I don't even use the lid on mine, since my large cat still doesn't like to go in with the lid on.
customer_reviews.author: Robin T

customer_reviews.title: Great size for big cats!
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for my cats! They are like mountain lions. Very big. Tall. They use this over the other jumbo I got so I'll be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy! I would recommend these to ANYONE with ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give more stars I would!! I got 3 of these for my cats so i could put them in the corners out of the way.. Because they were corner boxes I worried they may be too small.. These things are big enough for 2 or 3 cats! I LOOOOOVE them! Perfect buy! I would recommend these to ANYONE with a multiple cat household.. Omg.. The price, the quality and i got them in only a few days! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, beautiful corner design!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and triangular shape, the design quality and top-notch construction is pure perfection. This box seemlessly blends into any corner, no more clunky eyesore with which to contend. The box's interior provides ample room for my adult cat move freely while inside. And daily scooping and cleaning is a breeze, the opening allows ease of access without any awkwardness.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ciotti

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cats
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items that doesn't always show up on Amazon. We bought one and had to wait a few months before we were able to order a second one. If you have more than one cat you should have a coupe litter boxes. This is a great item. Large and high curbs so litter is trapped inside the box instead of collecting along the edge when you remove the top for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rootes Author

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The seam between the top and the bottom of the pan is not tight, and if you have a cat that stands or sprays whilst urinating, you will have seepage. The fasteners on the top panel don't really help, either. I learned the hard way that my clothes hanging in the closet near the litter box were getting stinky. Plus urine drips down the side and is disgusting to clean. I am going back to buying the Rubbermaid Roughneck storage containers with lids and making my own boxes. This one was a waste of money. But if you have a small space, and a small cat, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: You’d think this would have a handle on top to pick it up. Nope. That is a bad part of the design. It is big. Not meant for small spaces. If a cat pees high, it drips into the gaps where the lid meets the bottom and you’re picking up by that lip and then get pee on your hands. It needs a top handle. And something to channel the high peeing cats urine into the bottom and not the channel where the lids lock.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lane

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST....Look no further!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best litter box I've owned..easy to clean, cat loves it...I had a Buddha one for years but when our new chubby cat joined my household...he needed something bigger and easier to get in and out of..He also spends a lots of time covering so the high sides keep all the litter in the box. IT'S GREAT..
customer_reviews.author: good karma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing answer to a real problem
customer_reviews.text: Extremely large and absolutely perfect for my fluffy (we can’t call him fat) cat. If you have an oversized cat, this is SO the cat box for them. Fits in my laundry room corner and is so much more humane for larger cats. I used to see my cat in a regular sized cat box and felt so bad for him..he could take like two steps. Who knows if he’s happier but I feel better about it 😃
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: These have held up really well over 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for each level of my home. There's plenty of room for my 11-lb cats, they can completely turn around inside the box. The corner style works really well - even though it's a large litter box, it is not intrusive in the room. The design seems to contain any odors. It is easy to clean out. It's a great design.
customer_reviews.author: MNmom

customer_reviews.title: It's about half-again as big as her last one and she really seems to love it. I thought she'd have some trouble going ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat immediately hopped in her new box as soon as the litter was in it (I never even had to sprinkle some of her old litter in there). It's about half-again as big as her last one and she really seems to love it. I thought she'd have some trouble going from an uncovered box to covered, but, nope, she just immediately loved it. And she's a timid cat! I love that it utilizes unused corner space. Someone that knows cats' needs and human aesthetic designed this. I can see ordering another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MD Linn

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo bags don't fit
customer_reviews.text: The box is plenty large enough and appears sturdy but I don't know what bags to use. I have a large selection of jumbo linings from the previous box and not one fits. Once litter is the bag it pulls it down and off the ledge. Having a diabetic cat that pee's more than a grown man with a drinking problem...This is a real issue. The corner design is a great idea but without the possibility of bags how useful is it really?
customer_reviews.author: pulley

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for larger cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is above average when it comes to his size, so this is perfect for him! It's heavy duty, it's easy to clean, there's a handle atop the lid that makes it easy to carry, it doesn't take up a lot of space (as it fits in a corner space), and it's very well vented! I went looking for a larger litter box at various pet retailers and nothing they had can compare to the size, quality, and the great price of this product. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dyleficent

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted: A litter box that keeps the litter inside the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade for the generic, rectangle litter box I had when I first adopted my cat. It's spacious for my 12lb cat and helps reduce odor. It's easy to clean and fits conveniently in the corner of any room. It was easy to assemble. I wanted a box that would reduce the amount of litter that leaves the box, and it definitely does. There is still a small amount that leaves the box when she does, but that is to be expected with any litter box.
customer_reviews.author: rippleinthewater

customer_reviews.title: large
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my three cats! The only issue is that it can be rather awkward when trying to empty and clean it and refill with litter, I definitely dropped it a few times trying to dump it into the trashcan. However it's large enough for one 23 lb cat, one 13 lb cat, and one 9lb cat to all use comfortably, and I was able to stuff it into the corner in our pantry because of the triangular design. I definitely recommend this if you're buying for some big kitties!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice large litterbox
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this box, me not so much. Trying to scoop out the soiled litter is a pain in the neck you have to remove the top to scoop out. But like I said my cats love this litter box so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: LEJTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and nice and wide for cats picky ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. My cat has always had a thing for peeing on the front wall and the higher-rise front ball thing catches most of it. Easy to clean and nice and wide for cats picky about space (like mine). I used to have a roll-clean kind until she didn’t like the reduced space anymore. The large size and light weight makes it pretty easy to drag to the toilet and scoop out even compared to the roll and your done kind. I’m pretty satisfied and so is the picky cat.
customer_reviews.author: Ayris

customer_reviews.title: easy to change
customer_reviews.text: This works well for 2 cats. It is large, easy to change, and has a nice large doorway. It also looks nice, and is easily hidden away in a corner. Two issues: 1) Only two clips on the backside to fasten the lid on, which makes it feel pretty flimsy when put together. 2) No handle on the top, which I would assume is because of how flimsy it is when you fasten the lid on. Because of this, you have to awkwardly lift it from the bottom to move it, or slide it around the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Great Litter Box!
customer_reviews.text: This product was large enough for my 14 lb cat to use! She's part maine-coon and this was a perfect litter box for her. I really enjoy that you can put it into a corner because we had the perfect spot for it in my apartment. The top has a charcoal scent blocker to filter out the scent of the cat litter. To be honest I barely smelled the litter anyway, even with the large opening. I'm not sure if that was from the charcoal blocker or from the litter box itself encasing the scent, but I found it to work nicely. I really enjoyed how tall the opening is as well because the litter has a harder time escaping!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious, nice and tall, fits perfectly agains a corner, great price and plastic is sturdy. I wish they came with a front lid flap but even at the pet store they do not have any like that with one. My cat is 13, has arthritis in both her hind legs which causes her not to be able to run or jump around so easily but she is able to go in and out of the box with no problem. Its the perfect height and size for a medium size cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: My cat and I think this is the best litter box ever! She's able to get in and out of it easily, and has plenty of room to move around inside. She's a litter kicker and this box keeps it contained really well. Instead of litter everywhere at the end of the day, there's a small spot where she manages to get a little out. It's super easy to clean without removing the lid. I have a scoop with a long handle and because the lid lets light in and the opening is big, it's easy to see where I need to scoop. This box is a win for kitty and me. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Booksflutterby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the size & height. UPDATE! Ok, I’ve had the extra large boxes out for 6 monthes. WHAT A DIFFERENCE!! If you have “cat box issues” here’s the 411 ... YOU MUST ALWAYS HAVE ONE BOX PER CAT PLUS AN EXTRA ONE!! I HAVE 4 CATS, SO 5 LITTER BOXES - I know I know, but mine are in my garage & I have a little cat door cut out for them. Yup, it’s a pain in the neck sometimes, BUT my house does not smell like cat urine!!!! Cats are happy, hubby is happy, LIFE IS GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a pooping party!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is MASSIVE! Which was exactly what I was looking for! =] We have a 20lb Maine Coon and it's perfect for him. We also have two 9lb domestic females and I'm pretty sure they could have a pooping party together in there its so roomy. We have two other litter boxes (Booda Domes) in the house and this litter box gets the most use. We use the hood but the bottom bin is super deep so even without the hood I imagine it would keep most of the litter inside. Some litter still escapes which I think is unavoidable, but a litter mat should help control that spreading. Highly recommended if you have a large cat!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sea

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter box. It is huge, which is great for our three cats. Also, I like that the clumps do not stick to the sides and bottom. They slide off easily. I would highly recommend this litter box. The only drawback might be it's size. I have lots of room in my utility room for it, but others might need to measure their space to make sure it fits. Great value for the price. You can scoop without removing the top.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Mc

customer_reviews.title: The litter is by far my favorite as it has no smell but destroys odors at ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with Nature's Miracle litter (the box through Amazon and the litter locally). The litter is by far my favorite as it has no smell but destroys odors at the same time better than the other litters with perfumes. The corner design of the litter box fits into my spare room nicely. It is the only covered litter box that I have been able to use with my larger cat (15 lb). Through Amazon the price is amazing as I have seen it cost much, much more in local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Hooded Corner Cat Box
customer_reviews.text: Love this litter box! It is huge, but sits in the corner and actually takes up less room than the previous one. It's big enough for my extra large tom cat to get in there and do his business. In the other litter box he would have to back in to do his business and that was the largest cat box I could find at the time. He's not fat, just an extra large cat. It's super easy to scoop too. The edges are curved. so you are able to get everything when you scoop. I have already ordered another box for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: 2 cats use it
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty large even for 2 cats! I clean it out every 2 days and it seems to be just the right amount of time in between cleanings. If i had one cat, i could go longer for sure. But its perfect for those kitties that fling litter and cat poo everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: venessa blasi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the cost - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These litter boxes are excellent. I completed quite a bit of research because I was tired of spending $30-$50 on litter boxes that promised cleanliness and odor control only to throw them away in a couple of months. The design isn't perfect at keeping all litter in the box, but it has cut down on the amount of tracked litter on my floor by probably 85%. These boxes are LARGE. I was not expecting how big they are, but my cats love the space. Also, they don't feel so large that you are wasting litter - some boxes just hold too much and the litter goes to waste. The construction quality is high. I would highly recommend these boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Charly

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in the pet store for twice the amount of money that I paid for on amazon for the same exact product. There's so much room for my 12 pound cat in there. At first he was hesitant being that he probably thought it was a crate since he originally had a bottom litter box only with no top and hes a scaredy cat with a fear of a lot, especially crates lol but after scooping some old cat litter into the new box he got in and seemed to enjoy it. I recommend this. It seems easy to clean and fits nicely in a corner of a room.
customer_reviews.author: Ika

customer_reviews.title: Beware for cats that pee high on the sides!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome when it was just our female cat, but now that we’ve adopted a new little male buddy, what a mess!! The lid does not seal properly, there is no gasket preventing liquid to seep out. Causing urine to run down the sides and pool underneath. Too bad they didn’t engineer the sides a little higher to prevent this from happening. So we had to throw out our beloved litter box for a high sided one.
customer_reviews.author: zachary miller

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this large spacious corner litter box!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this large spacious corner litter box! I wasn’t sure if they would use a covered box but they do and love it! I love how it blocks the view of the litter and the house smells much better now. Also prevents pee outside the box from those cats who don’t squat low enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Big box for a big cat
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my vet tech daughter for my larger cat. A standard litter box didn't do the trick, but this has plenty of room to move around and get comfortable. The opening is large, no claustrophobia here.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Claustrophobic cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: My scaredy cat -- who is an enthusiastic litter box digger -- has steadfastly refused to go into covered litter boxes since she was tiny. Eureka! She loves this one, which is big enough to 1) catch almost all of the litter she energetically tosses around, and 2) overcome her fear of small enclosed spaces. Further, its triangular shape allows it to be tucked into obscure spaces where it is unlikely to be noticed by anyone except you and your cats. Whoever designed this must be a cat person, because I don't think he/she could have come up with a litter box any more feline friendly.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! Looking at the pictures I thought the opening might be too low and that she would be able to kick litter out of it. That is definitely not the case. The size is great because she has plenty of room to do her business and cover it without making a mess outside the box. Like other reviewers have said, don't get this thing if you are trying to save space. It may be made to fit in the corner, but it does not necessarily fit snuggly and it's still rather large. That being said, it is a perfect fit for our available space and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Local pet stores didn't have corner litter boxes. Taller ...
customer_reviews.text: Local pet stores didn't have corner litter boxes. Taller then expected and front lower entrance cold be a bit higher to avoid litter kick out. But maybe that's just my cat who has chosen to kick out instead of toward the back of the unit . Holds a lot of litter
customer_reviews.author: Kathran Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Kitty approved!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my cats would not accept it since they are a bit picky and skeptical about new stuff but they loved it. Before I filled it with the clay litter they used to just lay inside it and use it as a hiding place. It's spacious enough even for my 17+ pound cat. i have 3 cats and this works great for them. It's easy to clean since the tops snaps on/off. On the top there is a space for a filter but I honestly don't think it made a difference in odor control, the key to odor control is definitely the clumping cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Very big though
customer_reviews.text: I had this litter box for a long time (years....) it was great, the filter on top really helped w/ any odor and I personally liked the size. My cat is very little and the larger size helped her to not make much of a mess when she was digging around. However, after moving a few times, I decided to get a smaller litter box. This was great while it lasted but it really does take up a decent amount of space so just FYI it's big.
customer_reviews.author: :)Lyzi(:

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Do you have a large cat/horse hybrid? Well my wife and I do and his big butt fits with ease! We love this thing. Easy to scrape/clean and no "factory/plastic" smell either. The only con though is no flap/door, so be prepared for some litter on the floor. This is the reason for only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DarthBiden

customer_reviews.title: Best Large Litter Box IMO
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for me. For whatever reason the smell is greatly reduced with this litter box vs. my old one. Perhaps it's the filter at the top. My cat has way more room now than before so I bet he is happy. It's HUGE, but not too big. I don't like that you can see in to it, but there are pros to that as well. I did a decent amount of research before settling on this one. If you go with one that has a door, make sure that the cat can't get stuck in or out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda Flame

customer_reviews.title: This litterbox is ENORMOUS. Was too expensive to return.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the idea of this but this litterbox is HUGE and I hoped that it would prevent my messy cat from making a mess. It is enormous. It was wayyyyy to big for my small apartment. I never even got to use it. I tried to return it, but the return shipping cost more than twice the litterbox itself. I ended up donating it to a local cat shelter. Hopefully they love this enormous littlerbox.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P.

customer_reviews.title: For large cats
customer_reviews.text: I've got a 28lb boy and this triangle shape gives him more room to maneuver so he can go potty more comfortably. My small girl cat loves the room as well. Nice for the corners of the rooms, tall and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cat box for a large
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cat box for a large, elderly, and overweight cat buddy. This box has plenty of turning and head space; thus limiting splashing & unnecessary mess on cat hair. This box is extremely easy to clean and the corner shape option is a great feature. Don't waist your time with small litter boxes. Go big or go home! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Great for multi cat homes
customer_reviews.text: Great for multi cat home. It’s very large but somehow the corner feature tucks it in & disguises the size. It has reduced the litter tracking significantly in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Especially great for large cats!
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is one big box, but this is great for my large cat, or any cat. She's about 15 lbs and has plenty of space in the box, I'd almost call it roomy. The door is nice and large and the dip in the front allows for easy access without spilling too much litter. The dip in the bottom pan also does not prevent the box from being filled really deep, probably at least 5-6 inches of litter could fit comfortably in the box. It fits well in a corner but is quite wide.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: I have bigger cats and needed a bigger box. This one is perfect and fits great in a corner. The only downside is that the opening is huge and lots of litter gets out when my cats dig. I created a curtain to try and block part of the opening but the lower lip of the pan isn't high enough so the curtain did little to help.
customer_reviews.author: Texas_Chick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my older cat
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old cat seemed to be struggling to get in and out of our other litter box - this is the perfect solution, as the entry is lower. The corner design is a space saver, too, but the litter box itself is bigger than most. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pleasants

customer_reviews.title: Liked this litter box before we even set it up ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked this litter box before we even set it up for use by our four kitties........liked the height, the opening for easy access and the filtered cover........and especially the larger size of the box itself.......Were concerned that perhaps our cats would feel otherwise but they all adjusted immediately.......so considering the cost which was very reasonable and the size etc........I am thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MAFS

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box. Second time purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this litter box. II have two cats, one who usually goes "up the sides" of a box. So far this box has been successful in keeping everything inside, though there has been the occasion when some urine has made it through the join between the lid and the base. Keeping a "wee wee" pad under the box has assisted in keep the floor clean, and taking the box apart a couple of times a week to clean between the seams has eliminated any build up of odors. Overall an excellent box. Love that it fits snug in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Catface approves!
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, tall, works well in the corner. Catface used it immediately, no problems, and it is now his preferred litter box. Just a minor irritation: the labels were unnecessarily difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Heiropolis

customer_reviews.title: The best to date
customer_reviews.text: For my large cat, this box is the best one I've found. It was difficult, however, to effectively clean the rounded corners. Although that makes sense, it took as long to clean this out as my old box. Still, my cat fit in the box (he is 3 feet, toe to tail), and there was less dust outside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dodester

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box I've found!
customer_reviews.text: We now have three of these and it has made life so much better! It keeps---ok, let's just be honest here---the pee and the litter in the box. We have two male cats who feel the need to perch on the edge of a litter box and you can guess the rest. This unit keeps everything where it belongs and they are really easy to clean. Oh, and the opening is really large for those scaredy cats who are timid about going through small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box yet
customer_reviews.text: Best litter box yet. All 5 (yes 5, no I'm not crazy just an animal rescuer/ lover) of my cats/ kittens use it no problem & have plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: angela christine

customer_reviews.title: My 3 cats love this box.
customer_reviews.text: 10 days in and my cats love this box. We have 3 cats, so 4 boxes total. When we scooped yesterday only 2 of the boxes were used, and this one was used the most. The other 2 were completely untouched. This box is so nice and roomy. The cats feel very safe and comfortable, lots of room to turn around and do their business.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I dont have time to scoop everyday so I like having larger cat litter boxes so they have room
customer_reviews.text: I have three furbabies, so that means four cat litter boxes. I dont have time to scoop everyday so I like having larger cat litter boxes so they have room. This litter box has a minimal profile but a lot room for them to move with the lid on. Its very sturdy and a great size for larger cats.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: He loved it so much I ordered a second one
customer_reviews.text: Cheddar is weird about most litter boxes. He refuses to use them bc he feels cramped. This has plenty of space for him to circle and go. Cheddar is particular. After shopping around for one he isn’t freaked out by or dislikes, found this baby. He loved it so much I ordered a second one. Happy kitty happy life
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: MASSIVE My petite lil lady (admittedly a nervous Nelly)didn't go anywhere near it. The entrance was up higher than her standing height. Probably better for bigger cats, say a Maine Coon or an ocelot. Returned-- partial refund: there was a restocking fee. Also, seemed to be a product from Wal-Mart-- could probably look at it in store and determine if it suits your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic cat box for putting in a corner
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cat box for putting in a corner. And that is why I purchased it. However, it is a bit smaller and I do not find a Cat's Pride Bag or any bag to use to remove the litter. And that is the only reason I gave it 4 starts. Now, if the seller had given better measurements, or told of a Bag that would work in side this one, I would give it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Hallmark

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever for large breed cat
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have purchased for my cat. He’s part Maine Coon or Norwegian (unsure, but he’s massive with some traits) and finding a covered box that fits him comfortably is tough. This is perfect. It doesn’t take up any more space in the laundry room than a traditional box, and I love that he can’t kick litter out of it. I absolutely recommend this to anyone with a large breed cat.
customer_reviews.author: JennMH

customer_reviews.title: the sides are pretty high, and the kitties can't fling litter out ...
customer_reviews.text: We have never used a litter box with a lid before so I wasn't sure how our kitties would react. I bought it because it fits in a corner and is much larger than our other litter box. And it is a BIG litterbox! On the plus side, the sides are pretty high, and the kitties can't fling litter out as easily. They have gotten used to the lid as well. Overall, I'm very pleased with this litterbox.
customer_reviews.author: nonspecificgirl

customer_reviews.title: The BEST LITTER BOX
customer_reviews.text: I got a new cat last April and got a standard box. My hubby kept telling me it was too small for cat but I wasn't listening. I finally got tired of having to sweep up litter from the floor everyday. I broke down and bought this one. I love it! I love how it has a built in filter, sits nicely in the corner, and keeps litter from the floor. It's much bigger than the picture. Frisco has plenty of room to do her business. We are all happy now!
customer_reviews.author: JABA

customer_reviews.title: Way too big but otherwise A-OK
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason I am returning this little box is because it is HUGE. For folks with multiple cats or large homes with plenty of places for little boxes, it's great. I live in a small space with a medium-sized cat that isn't all that messy... I'm going to opt for a tall and thin littler box with a smaller footprint. This king-sized littler box is really meant for huge cats or for wild cat parties or for cats with anger-management issues that like to communicate their disdain towards their owners with a spray of litter all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hastings

product_meta.title: Good'n'Fun Nature's Miracle Advanced Hooded Corner Litter Box
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1Nature's Miracle Advanced Corner Hooded Cat Litter BoxNature's Miracle Advanced Corner Hooded Cat Litter Box is made with advanced plastic technology for outstanding odor control. Odor blocking plastic material guards against the growth of odor caused by bacteria and prevents odors from being absorbed into plastic. Constructed using Ionpure(TM) antimicrobial product protection that inhibits the growth of odor-causing bacteria on surface. Additionally the non-stick surface eliminates litter caking and odor build up for easy, hassle free cleaning. The corner litter box hood features two latching side locks and an odor control charcoal filter that absorbs unwanted litter box odors for up to 3 months. The space saving corner design provides more usable space and is great for tight spaces. The large size is ideal for multiple cat households. The deep black base has flecks of gold for a sleek look that will look great in any home.
feature_bullets: The item dimensions are 26”L x 23”W x 11”H and the case dimensions are 24.2”L x 24.2”W x 21.7”H.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
